adrFormatAddress: 314 E 19th St, New York, NY 10003-2804, USA

originalText.text:
In addition to being a religious center for the Manhattan Mennonites, Menno House is also a guest house.  I stayed here for 2 nights, and the room they put me up in was larger than most hotel rooms.

Understated guesthouse on a residential, tree lined street with a great location and proximity to public transit.  (Closest subway hub is Union Square 14th St, which is about 6/7 blocks away.)  Great value, considering the location.

text.text:
In addition to being a religious center for the Manhattan Mennonites, Menno House is also a guest house.  I stayed here for 2 nights, and the room they put me up in was larger than most hotel rooms.

Understated guesthouse on a residential, tree lined street with a great location and proximity to public transit.  (Closest subway hub is Union Square 14th St, which is about 6/7 blocks away.)  Great value, considering the location.

originalText.text: I loved staying here. Granted, I wasn't really in my room that much. But it was so comfortable and clean and quiet. I loved the guest fridge. I loved the clean bathroom. I loved the area. I loved that I could leave my bags in the office after I checked out. I want to stay here every time I come to NYC.

text.text: I loved staying here. Granted, I wasn't really in my room that much. But it was so comfortable and clean and quiet. I loved the guest fridge. I loved the clean bathroom. I loved the area. I loved that I could leave my bags in the office after I checked out. I want to stay here every time I come to NYC.

originalText.text: Fabulous community of peace-loving people. My church has potlucks here. We are the Manhattan Mennonite Fellowship. We invite you to visit at the 5 pm service Sundays nearby at the Meeting House. Some rooms are available by the night, but book ahead through the managers. A kind, compassionate group of people interested in peace in our world. Followers of Christ. Seeking justice.

originalText.text: Had a wonderful stay at the Menno House! The bedroom and bathroom were clean and Michelle is so friendly and helpful.  Instructions for the TV remotes would have been handy. We will be back!

text.text: Had a wonderful stay at the Menno House! The bedroom and bathroom were clean and Michelle is so friendly and helpful.  Instructions for the TV remotes would have been handy. We will be back!

originalText.text: Once upon a time MH provided me with a safe, comfortable and affordable place to stay on NYC. I will always be grateful for that. Thank you
